text: Herzberg (Elster) is a town in the Elbe-Elster district of the German federal state of Brandenburg. ==Overview== As of 2004, its population is 10,968 and the mayor is Michael Oecknigk of the Christian Democratic Union. Villa Marx Herzberg (Elster) is twinned with the following cities: * Büdingen, Hesse * Świebodzin, Poland * Dixon, Illinois, United States of America * Soest, North Rhine-Westphalia From 1939 to 1945 there was the Deutschlandsender Herzberg/Elster, a huge longwave transmitter, whose mast was the second tallest construction in the world, at Herzberg/Elster.
